title: Dragon Tales Disc "Let's Be Brave"
description:
Here are 5 episodes and 3 songs from the PBS kids' show Dragon Tales. They have been ripped from the DVD release "Let's Be Brave" (2006). The titles are as follows:

Calling Dr. Zak
Musical Scales
Sounds Like Trouble
Stormy Weather
The Big Sleepover

Songs:
Betcha' Can
Hum
Speak Up

Both the full episodes and the songs have only an English audio track. The episodes are dubbed in Spanish and the alternate track made available through the SAP feature when they air on television, but for some reason this DVD release is English-only. Please seed if you have the means--my connection is only 50kB up.

Video: 1474-3206 Kbps, 640*480 (4:3) at 29.970 fps, MPEG-4 (XviD)
Audio: 128 Kbps, 48000 Hz, 2 channels, MPEG (MP3) (Version 1) Layer-3, Joint stereo
